I'm a hacker based in Copenhagen, Denmark. I go by he/him.

I'm interested in privacy-enhancing technologies, internet censorship, cryptography, security, free software, and distributed systems.

I work with @torproject and have the privilege of leading Tor's amazing Network Team. When I'm not working, I enjoy organizing the annual Danish hacker festival #BornHack, pursuing amateur #photography, and trying my hand at #homebrewing.
